column5: I was checking out Navionics; but since there are 3 different Cedar lakes in Ontario(and they only list one), just wondering if anyone has bought one of their chips (or someone elses) and used them sucessfully?Considering getting a fish finder GPS combo unit and might as well look at one with the right GPS chip.ThanksTerwalleye
BUMP!My Fishin Pardner just got a new Humminbird. Wondering if anyone has used any of the Navionics chips on Cedar. The one attached to Perrault and just north of Vermillion BayThanks in advance
Just give a call to one of the lodge owners on Cedar or Perrault. They will know without question.
I have a 'bird 998 with the Navionics bundle. The map for Cedar/Perrault showed that we were fishing on land several times. This is older data. Not sure what a more current chip would show.
Thanks for the heads up Bad Santa. Can I ask whcih year you bought the chip?
the data came with the unit. I bought it august of 10
Hope your mom is feeling better. I have a humminbird with the Navionics Canada chip and it works great on Cedar.
The Nanionics map for Cedar Lake in the Perrault Falls,Ontario area is on both the Canada Chip and the Northern US map. Both are the same.Best of luch this summer....Al
